meanings.definition: A spicy sauce made with tomatoes, onions, and peppers.
meanings.sent1: I love to dip my chips in salsas.
meanings.sent2: She made a delicious salsa for the party.
meanings.sent3: The salsas at the restaurant were so hot, they made my eyes water.
meanings.sent4: The salsas of flavors in her cooking were a symphony for the taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the salsas brightened up the table.

meanings.definition: A type of dance music with a fast tempo.
meanings.sent1: The club played salsas all night long.
meanings.sent2: The band's new album features catchy salsas.
meanings.sent3: The salsas at the party got everyone on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The salsas of beats in the song were electrifying.
meanings.sent5: The energetic salsas had everyone moving to the rhythm.

meanings.definition: A type of Latin American dance.
meanings.sent1: They performed traditional salsas at the festival.
meanings.sent2: Learning salsas is a fun way to stay active.
meanings.sent3: The salsas competition brought out the best dancers in town.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements in the salsas were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic salsas captured the spirit of the culture.
